What are you looking for? Advanced Search Home > All Categories > Dining Out > Fast Food > Resolved Question Bela Member since: January 27, 2008 Total points: 576 (Level 2) Add Contact Block
Resolved Question Show me another » How do they make vanilla milk shake at Burger King?
4 years ago Report Abuse by Clarissa S Member since: May 11, 2008 Total points: 794 (Level 2) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Voters You have a vanilla mix that comes in this plastic type of bag/carton and you dump in into the machine which keeps it at a certain temperature and depending on what flavor you want you have different syrups that mix in with the vanilla flavoring.. but your just asking about vanilla.. PS. you press the vanilla button, put the cup on the holder and pull the lever down but you have to be careful if the cup is facing the wrong way your cup can fall of.. the cups are automatically measured to know how much to fill it up with
haha sorry I think I just got a little carried away but you get the point ;) 4 years ago Report Abuse 33% 3 Votes 2 people rated this as good

This question about" How do they make van… "was originally asked in Yahoo! Answers United States
Other Answers (5) Show: All Answers Oldest to Newest Newest to Oldest Rated Highest to Lowest by Mommie in September Member since: May 14, 2008 Total points: 230 (Level 1) Add Contact Block They don't it comes from a large metal machine just like soft serve icecream. Most fast food establishments choose this method because making a hand-dipped milkshake is a little more expensive and a little more time consuming. 4 years ago Report Abuse 22% 2 Votes 1 person rated this as good by Bad Habit Member since: April 25, 2008 Total points: 658 (Level 2) Add Contact Block squeze a vanilla cow same with chocolate. But imagine the peanut butter and cookies and cream. 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by Bigdog Member since: March 30, 2006 Total points: 7,739 (Level 5) Add Contact Block Not trying to be sarcastic, but with a vanilla milk shake machine and their mix that comes in a carton. So do all the other fast food joints. 4 years ago Report Abuse 22% 2 Votes 1 person rated this as good by Frenchie Member since: May 09, 2008 Total points: 525 (Level 2) Add Contact Block As disgusting as it is to say, most fast food places have lard in their milk shakes. Yeah... lard... in a milk shake... ew. 4 years ago Report Abuse 11% 1 Vote 1 person rated this as good by reneethe... Member since: April 19, 2008 Total points: 127 (Level 1) Add Contact Block with the milkshake machine. 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes 1 person rated this as good
